name: Witches of Wapool
description:
The human villages have been taken by the ogres and their queen, the humans imprisoned and made sport of. A witch adopted by an escaped human living in the woods are the only ones who are truly free.  

Play as the Ogre Queen’s child, Eduarda (THEY/THEM), who despises the role they were born into. Caught between their mother and their duty, or their childhood friend Coco the Witch, which will you choose? 

Make Eduarda’s choices throughout by choosing from a list of responses and actions, leading to different endings depending on which path you take. Who knows, depending on which choices you make, you might even be able to win the heart of your favorite hot witch girl. Beware the bad ones though…they don't end well for you. 

(Secret endings and flashbacks are discoverable throughout!)

Game created by:

Cindy Wang- Character Designer, Sprite Artist, Cutscenes Artist, Script Writer, Programmer, Ren'Py Editor

Erin Au - Director, Background Artist, Writer and Presenter, GUI Customization

Zobia Khalid - Concept Writer, Supporting Cutscenes Artist

We hope you enjoy our little fantasy romance game! Download, extract, and enjoy! ^^
